report.query: select subprof.lsp_le_id as PartyId,subprof.lsp_short_name as PartyName, lmt.lmt_id as LimitId,lmt.facility_name as facilityname,lmt.facility_type as facilitytype, (select entry_name from common_code_category_entry where category_code='FACILITY_CATEGORY' and entry_code= lmt.facility_cat and ACTIVE_STATUS='1') as facilitycategory, lmt.CMS_REQ_SEC_COVERAGE as SactionedLimit from sci_lsp_appr_lmts lmt,sci_lsp_lmt_profile lmtprof,sci_le_sub_profile subprof

whereClause.mandatoryClause: is_from_camonline_req in('N') and lmtprof.cms_lsp_lmt_profile_id = lmt.cms_limit_profile_id and subprof.cms_le_sub_profile_id = lmtprof.cms_customer_id AND subprof.status != 'INACTIVE'
